E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 2/10/1984
Subject: Trade offer
Dear Sir,
I would like to offer you following trade:
1B Hobert Yan
in return for
3B Keith Christie, 2B Troy Mckee, SS Reinaldo Echeverria.

Please let me know if you accept!

Best Regards,
Bay City GM



Date: Saturday, 3/1/1984
Subject: Trade offer
Dear Sir,
I would like to offer you following trade:
SP Dan Coley, 3B Gonzalo Cortes, MR Timothy Marr
in return for
3B Emil Abeilla.

Please let me know if you accept!

Best Regards,
Plum Grove GM

Team Doctor



Date: Saturday, 5/17/1984
Subject: Extension?
Dear Sir,
I am really enjoying playing for your team.
I would be interested in a contract extension!
How about you?

Regards,
Bertram Regis
